## Feature Description

Integrate Stripe for payment processing in our e-commerce platform. Key details:

- Accept credit card payments (Visa, Mastercard, Amex) via Stripe Elements
- Store tokenized card reference (Stripe token) in PostgreSQL for recurring billing
- Customer billing data (name, email, last 4 digits, billing address) in billing_profiles table
- Webhook endpoint at /api/webhooks/stripe for payment events
- Admin dashboard shows transaction history with customer name and partial card number
- Retry logic for failed charges: up to 3 retries over 7 days
- Email receipts via SendGrid with order details and billing address
- No encryption at rest for billing_profiles table currently
- API keys for Stripe and SendGrid in environment variables
- Logging includes full request/response bodies for debugging
